ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.10'

about.description:
Smassh tries to be a full fledged typing test experience but not missing out on looks and feel!
Features:
  - An interactive & beautiful UI
  - Words and Time modes for typing
  - Real-time comparison of speed carets
  - Change styles/settings on the fly
  - Mutliple theme support
  - Mutliple language support
  - Lots of options to tweak!
about.summary: Smassh is a TUI based typing test application inspired by MonkeyType -- A very popular online web-based typing application

about.description:
Smassh tries to be a full fledged typing test experience but not missing out on looks and feel!
Features:
  - An interactive & beautiful UI
  - Words and Time modes for typing
  - Real-time comparison of speed carets
  - Change styles/settings on the fly
  - Mutliple theme support
  - Mutliple language support
  - Lots of options to tweak!
about.summary: Smassh is a TUI based typing test application inspired by MonkeyType -- A very popular online web-based typing application

name: smassh
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  version: 3.2.1

package:
  name: smassh
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  - url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/s/smassh/smassh-${{ version }}.tar.gz
    sha256: 941bdce3d8ba93114c91b436dca65baa932aec36722413cc62fc50be90aa7cb4

build:
  number: 0
  script: ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install .
  noarch: python
  python:
    entry_points:
      - smassh = smassh.__main__:main

requirements:
  host:
    - python ${{ python_min }}.*
    - hatchling
    - pip
  run:
    - python >=${{ python_min }}
    - click >=8.1.7
    - platformdirs >=4.3.6
    - requests >=2.31.0
    - textual >=3.2.0

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - smassh
      pip_check: true
      python_version: ${{ python_min }}.*
  - script:
    - smassh --help

about:
  summary: Smassh is a TUI based typing test application inspired by MonkeyType -- A very popular online web-based typing application
  description: |
    Smassh tries to be a full fledged typing test experience but not missing out on looks and feel!
    Features:
      - An interactive & beautiful UI
      - Words and Time modes for typing
      - Real-time comparison of speed carets
      - Change styles/settings on the fly
      - Mutliple theme support
      - Mutliple language support
      - Lots of options to tweak!
  homepage: https://github.com/kraanzu/smassh
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_file: LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - claudiushaag
